blogPost.excerpt: PeachPay empowers creators and freelancers to convert their passion into income, and start accepting payment quickly through our simple and accelerated checkout method.
blogPost.body: PeachPay empowers creators and freelancers to convert their passion into income, and start accepting payment quickly through our simple and accelerated checkout method.
blogPost.title: PeachPay - Convert your passion into income
blogPost.author: Ben Lang

localize.description: PeachPay使创作者和自由职业者能够将他们的热情转化为收入，并通过我们简单和加速的结账方式快速接受付款。
localize.tagline: 将您的热情转化为收入

localize.description: PeachPay使創作者和自由職業者能夠將他們的熱情轉化爲收入，並通過我們簡單和加速的結賬方式快速接受付款。
localize.tagline: 將您的熱情轉化爲收入

previous.excerpt: Lizard is an online guessing and trick-winning card game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to pick a number and win exactly as many times as you said you would. Not more, not less. Use special cards and rules to ruin your opponents.
previous.title: Lizard - Online card game for up to 6 players

localize.description: 蜥蜴》是一款最多可以容纳6名玩家的在线猜谜赢牌游戏。你的目标是选择一个数字，并赢得完全与你说的次数一样。不能多，也不能少。使用特殊的卡片和规则来毁掉你的对手。
localize.tagline: 在线纸牌游戏，最多可容纳6名玩家

localize.description: 蜥蜴》是一款最多可以容納6名玩家的在線猜謎贏牌遊戲。你的目標是選擇一個數字，並贏得完全與你說的次數一樣。不能多，也不能少。使用特殊的卡片和規則來毀掉你的對手。
localize.tagline: 在線紙牌遊戲，最多可容納6名玩家

next.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.
next.title: Worksphere - Software to manage your flexible workplace

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作场所管理软件，为企业提供员工在办公室或远程工作的选择。Worksphere可以自动预约办公桌，安全输入，并为您提供办公室使用数据，以正确确定工作场所的规模。
localize.tagline: 管理灵活工作场所的软件

localize.description: Worksphere是一款工作場所管理軟件，爲企業提供員工在辦公室或遠程工作的選擇。Worksphere可以自動預約辦公桌，安全輸入，併爲您提供辦公室使用數據，以正確確定工作場所的規模。
localize.tagline: 管理靈活工作場所的軟件
